analysis.description:
FeeCollector.collectForREQBurning (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#619-627) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- requestBurnerContract.transfer(_amount) (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#622-626)
Bytes.extractAddress (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#166-180) is declared view but contains assembly code
Bytes.extractBytes32 (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#188-201) is declared view but contains assembly code
Bytes.updateBytes20inBytes (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#207-221) is declared view but contains assembly code
RequestCore.extractBytes32 (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#1277-1288) is declared view but contains assembly code
RequestCore.extractAddress (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#1300-1313) is declared view but contains assembly code
mainExpectedAmount in RequestCore.createRequestFromBytes (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#935) is a local variable never initialiazed
mainExpectedAmount in RequestCore.createRequest (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#852-853) is a local variable never initialiazed
mainPayee in RequestCore.createRequestFromBytes (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#935) is a local variable never initialiazed
mainPayee in RequestCore.createRequest (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#850) is a local variable never initialiazed

RequestCore.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#1293-1295) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,amount) (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#1295)

RequestERC20.paymentInternal has external calls inside a loop:
	- requestCore.updateBalance(_requestId,i,_payeeAmounts[i].toInt256Safe()) (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#1950-1953)

RequestERC20.paymentInternal has external calls inside a loop:
	- addressToPay = requestCore.getPayeeAddress(_requestId,i) (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#1959)

Reentrancy in RequestERC20.createAcceptAndPayFromBytes (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#1859-1918):
	External calls:
	- requestId = requestCore.createRequestFromBytes(_requestData) (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#1904-1906)
	External calls sending eth:
	- collectForREQBurning(fees) (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#1900)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- payeesPaymentAddress (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#1913)

Reentrancy in RequestERC20.createRequestAsPayeeAction (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#1650-1681):
	External calls:
	- (requestId,collectedFees) = createCoreRequestInternal(_payer,_payeesIdAddress,_expectedAmounts,_data) (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#1659-1663)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- payeesPaymentAddress (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#1674-1675)
	- payerRefundAddress (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#1679-1680)

Reentrancy in RequestERC20.createRequestAsPayerAction (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#1810-1845):
	External calls:
	- (requestId,collectedFees) = createCoreRequestInternal(msg.sender,_payeesIdAddress,_expectedAmounts,_data) (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#1819-1825)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- payerRefundAddress (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#1832)

RequestERC20.broadcastSignedRequestAsPayerAction (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#1707-1734) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(_expirationDate >= block.timestamp,expiration should be after current time) (/unique_chucks/19/0xfa7b14e5e5e0b59ef6fb86f56928349eb607cbb3.sol#1720-1723)

elements.expression: require(bool,string)(_expirationDate >= block.timestamp,expiration should be after current time)
